name: Toronto Marriott Bloor Yorkville Hotel

reviews.text: The staff at the Marriott Bloor Yorkville treated us like royalty. We were immediately impressed upon check-in on how great the customer service is at this hotel. The staff greets you by name after the first interaction. The rooms are spacious and large. Our suite (upgraded as a Platinum member) was as large as a 1 bedroom city apartment with a walk-in closet and a separate living room. The complimentary arrival gift and buffet breakfast was also a treat. We will definitely stay at this Marriott the next time we are in Toronto.
reviews.title: Wow! One of the Best Marriotts!

reviews.text: This hotel was a home away from home at a very difficult time for us. Staff welcomed us with our dog and cossetted us all along the way. We had to stay 7 nights because there was no power in our house. If I hadn't been so worried about our house, I would have had a great time; the food was good, rooms very comfortable with terrific beds, the location is great and the staff hard working and friendly. We were so busy checking up with Hydro about getting power that we didn't try the pool or spa; we should have but...that's for next time.
reviews.title: Orphans of the Ice Storm
Great service!!
reviews.text: I've never reviewed an hotel before but I'm so thankful for everything this one did for us in our hour of need that I want to thank its staff.

reviews.title: Clean, comfortable room
reviews.text: Hotel had fabulous service. Upon check in they offered us a

Free upgrade to the concierge floor. Our room was a king and very clean. Nice products in the bathroom, big room, clean. Front desk was more than helpful when we needed directions etc. Parking for hotel is expensive but there is a parking garage for Hudson's bay company department store connected to the hotel that is only $15 a day on weekends. Also there is a subway connected to the hotel so you don't even have to walk outside. It also connects to some shops and Hudson's bay dept store. reviews.title: Lovely staff

description: The Toronto Marriott Bloor Yorkville located in Yorkville, Toronto's downtown fashionable shopping, dining and entertainment quarter offers a Toronto hotel with direct access to the Yonge and Bloor subway and features newly renovated guest rooms.
